Title: Limits liability certain provisions of the labor law for construction accident in Nassau and Suffolk counties
Summary: Limits liability for certain provisions of the labor law for construction accidents in Nassau and Suffolk counties when such accident is elevation-related.
LawCode: Add ยง103-h, Gen Muni L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general municipal law, in relation to limiting liability for elevation-related construction accidents in Nassau and Suffolk counties
